Posts.Content: My surgeon at St Vincent, Portland OR was Dr. Delamelena.  My radiation oncologist is Dr. Louis at the same hospital.  After the oncologists reviewed other ACCB cases, the decision was made to not do chemo, but to go with radiation.  I finish up my 6 1/2 weeks of radiation this week.
Posts.Title: Adenoid Cystic Carcinoma in the Breast

Posts.Content: Just yesterday I too was diagnosed with this type of breast cancer.  This Monday I go in for an additional lumpectomy to see if there is any cancer within my lymph nodes. I will continue to watch this site for additional comments.  My doctor mentioned yesterday chemotherapy, but this time did not mention radiation.  We'll know more next week, and then likely decision making.
